resources.string: ASAP is a player of Atari 8-bit music. It emulates the POKEY sound chip and the 6502 processor. ASAP supports the following file formats: SAP, CMC, CM3, CMR, CMS, DMC, DLT, MPT, MPD, RMT, TMC, TM8, TM2, FC.

Another Slight Atari Player (C) 2005-2014 Piotr Fusik
CMC, MPT, TMC, TM2 players (C) 1994-2005 Marcin Lewandowski
RMT player (C) 2002-2005 Radek Sterba
DLT player (C) 2009 Marek Konopka
CMS player (C) 1999 David Spilka
FC player (C) 2011 Jerzy Kut
